patthana19.2:1.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
patthana19.2:1.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya
patthana19.2:1.1_2: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana19.2:1.1_3: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:2.1_0: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
patthana19.2:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya
patthana19.2:2.1_2: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana19.2:2.1_3: paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.2:3.1_0: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana19.2:3.1_1: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
patthana19.2:3.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya
patthana19.2:3.1_3: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati
patthana19.2:4.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
